Microwindows Nano-X API Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
GR_CAL_DATACalibration data passed to GrCalcTransform
GR_EVENTUnion of all possible event structures
GR_EVENT_BUTTONEvent for a mouse button pressed down or released
GR_EVENT_CLIENT_DATAGR_EVENT_TYPE_CLIENT_DATA
GR_EVENT_CLIENT_DATA_REQGR_EVENT_TYPE_CLIENT_DATA_REQ
GR_EVENT_ERROREvent for errors detected by the server
GR_EVENT_EXPOSUREEvent for exposure for a region of a window
GR_EVENT_FDINPUTGrRegisterInput() event
GR_EVENT_GENERALGeneral events for focus in or focus out for a window, or mouse enter or mouse exit from a window, or window unmapping or mapping, etc
GR_EVENT_KEYSTROKEEvent for a keystroke typed for the window with has focus
GR_EVENT_MOUSEEvents for mouse motion or mouse position
GR_EVENT_SCREENSAVERGR_EVENT_TYPE_SCREENSAVER
GR_EVENT_SELECTION_CHANGEDGR_EVENT_TYPE_SELECTION_CHANGED
GR_EVENT_TIMERGR_EVENT_TYPE_TIMER
GR_EVENT_UPDATEGR_EVENT_TYPE_UPDATE
GR_GC_INFOGraphics context properties returned by the GrGetGCInfo() call
GR_PALETTEColor palette
GR_RECTNano-X rectangle, different from MWRECT
GR_WINDOW_INFOWindow properties returned by the GrGetWindowInfo() call
GR_WM_PROPERTIESWindow manager properties used by the GrGetWMProperties()/GrSetWMProperties() calls
